abstract.label: Idea Summary
abstract.help: The Science Verification Idea summary should clearly communicate the Science Verification Ideaâ€™s objectives, relevance, expected outcomes, and potential impact, serving as a high-level overview of the Science Verification Idea's essential points. The summary should be succinct yet detailed enough to convey the essence of the Science Verification Idea, highlighting its innovation and relevance to the field. The text should be a maximum of 250 words.
abstract.helper: Please enter the summary of your Science Verification Idea. This field allows latex syntax. - Word count {{current}} / {{max}}

addProposal.success: Science Verification Idea added with unique identifier
addProposal.toolTip: Click to add a new Science Verification Idea.
addProposal.warning: Please wait whilst we create a new Science Verification Idea.

addTarget.toolTip: Will add the target to the list associated with this Science Verification Idea.

assignBtn.toolTip: Assign Science Verification Ideas to a review panel

assignProposals.label: Assign Science Verification Ideas
assignProposals.toolTip: Click to assign Science Verification Ideas to the panel.
assignProposals.warning: Please wait whilst we assign the Science Verification Ideas.

changeProposal.label: Change Science Verification Idea's type?
changeProposal.content1: You are about to change the type of your Science Verification Idea.
changeProposal.content2: Some data specific to the Science Verification Idea type may be lost.

conflict.tooltip: Indicate whether there is a conflict of interest with this Science Verification Idea

decisionComments.help: Comments provided by the chairperson when making a decision on the Science Verification Idea.

displayProposal.warning: Please wait whilst we load the selected Science Verification Idea.

email.label: Email
email.help: The email is a required field. The individual will be invited to participate in this Science Verification Idea using this email, so please ensure it is correct. If using the search functionality, the email should be of a registered user within SKAO systems. For example, @skao.int, @assoc.skao.int, or @community.skao.int.

invitation.subject: Science Verification Idea invitation.
invitation.body: You have been invited to contribute to Science Verification Idea {{id}}

email.error: Email invite was unsuccessful and member is not added

emailSearch.error: User could not be found. Please check the email address and try again.

firstName.help: First name of the team member

homeBtn.title: Science Verification Ideas
homeBtn.tooltip: Returns to the list of Science Verification Ideas

lastName.help: Last name of the team member

manageTeamMember.label: Manage Team Member Rights
manageTeamMember.success: Team member's access has been updated.
manageTeamMember.error: Failed to update team member's access.
manageTeamMember.help: Select the rights for this team member. The creating participant has all rights by default. They can assign rights to other team members as needed.

submit.label: Submit rights
submit.help: Check to indicate that this individual can submit, edit and view the Science Verification Idea.

edit.label: Edit rights
edit.help: Check to indicate that this individual can edit and view the Science Verification Idea.

update.label: Update rights
update.help: Check to indicate that this individual can update and view the Science Verification Idea.

view.label: View rights
view.help: Check to indicate that this individual can view the Science Verification Idea.

proposal.error: Unable to retrieve the Science Verification Idea from the server

desc.4: These projects require more than one Science Verification Idea cycle to complete (e.g., long-term monitoring campaigns) but are too short in overall observing time, limited in observatory resources and/or scientific scope to qualify as a KSP.

proposalAttribute.help: One or more of these optional attributes may be selected to further refine the Science Verification Idea.

proposals.empty: THERE ARE NO SCIENCE VERIFICATION IDEAS TO BE DISPLAYED
proposals.label: Science Verification Ideas

proposalType.help: Select from the options below the most appropriate type classification for the Science Verification Idea. This can be changed later if needed, but be aware that this may affect information previously entered.

members.empty: THERE ARE NO PARTICIPANTS ASSOCIATED WITH THIS Science Verification Idea

reviewProposal.submit: Submit the review of the Science Verification Idea
reviewProposal.title: Review Science Verification Idea

reviewProposalList.title: Review Science Verification Ideas
reviewProposalList.toolTip: List of Science Verification Ideas for review

saveBtn.tooltip: Saves the Science Verification Idea in the current state to the database

scienceCategory.label: Observing Mode
scienceCategory.help: Select a mode that best describes the science of your Science Verification Idea.

scienceSubCategory.help: SUB-CATEGORY: Select a sub-category that best describes your Science Verification Idea.

submitAllBtn.tooltip: Submit all reviewed Science Verification Ideas

submitBtn.tooltip: Progress the Science Verification Ideas to the submitted state

targets.empty: There are no targets associated with this Science Verification Idea
targets.limitReached: Only a single target/object is allowed for Science Verification Ideas.

uploadCsvBtn.uploadSuccessMsg: All targets in file have been uploaded into the Science Verification Idea

validationBtn.tooltip: Performs enhanced validation upon the Science Verification Idea

viewProposalIcon.clicked: View Science Verification Idea Icon clicked

0.desc: This page allows users to provide the title for the Science Verification Idea.

1.desc: Participants creating the Science Verification Idea should ensure that fellow participants are registered through the SKAO portal. Participants with pending status will be removed from the Science Verification Idea during validation of a submitted Science Verification Idea.

2.desc: This page allows the user to provide general information about the Science Verification Idea.

3.label: Description
3.title: Description
3.desc: Upload a document for this Science Verification Idea in a portable document format (pdf).
3.pageError: The DESCRIPTION page is not complete
3.help: This is help for the Description Page

4.desc: Select a category to associate target with this Science Verification Idea.
